facts: If you lift a kangaroo’s tail off the ground it can’t hop.
A sheep, a duck and a rooster were the first passengers in a hot air balloon.
About 8,000 Americans are injured by musical instruments each year.
UPS trucks get about 15,000 parking tickets a month in New York City.
Facebook runs on 61 million lines of code. That's more than twice the amount needed for an F-35 Fighter Jet.
The typical American lives no more than 18 miles from their mom.
We went to the moon before we put wheels on suitcases.
